scripts.lint:check: yarn workspaces foreach -A run lint:check && eslint --cache  "./**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}" --ignore-path .eslintignore --config .eslintrc.json
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspaces foreach -A run lint:fix && eslint --cache  "./**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}" --ignore-path .eslintignore --config .eslintrc.json --fix
scripts.prettier:check: yarn workspaces foreach -A run prettier:check && yarn prettier --check "./examples/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}" --ignore-path .eslintignore --config .prettierrc.json
scripts.prettier:format: yarn workspaces foreach -A run prettier:format && yarn prettier --write "./examples/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}" --ignore-path .eslintignore --config .prettierrc.json
